codes.INVALID_STATUS: This operation is not allowed in the current status. Please check the document status
codes.INVALID_TRANSITION: Invalid status transition. Please follow the correct workflow
codes.INVALID_QUANTITY: Invalid quantity. Please enter a value greater than 0
codes.INVALID_COST: Invalid cost amount. Please check your input
codes.INVALID_CREATOR: Invalid creator information. Please log in again
codes.INVALID_SOURCE: Invalid source. Please check the linked document
codes.INSUFFICIENT_STOCK: Insufficient stock. Please check available quantity
codes.DUPLICATE_PRODUCT: This product has already been added
codes.ITEM_NOT_FOUND: Item not found. Please refresh and try again
codes.LOCK_NOT_FOUND: Lock record not found. It may have been released
codes.NO_ITEMS: Please add at least one item
codes.INCOMPLETE_COUNT: Please complete counting for all items first
codes.HAS_LOCKED_STOCK: Stock is locked. Please wait for related orders to be processed
codes.BATCH_NOT_FOUND: Batch not found. Please refresh and try again
codes.ORDER_NOT_FOUND: Order not found. It may have been deleted
codes.CUSTOMER_NOT_FOUND: Customer not found. Please select again
codes.SUPPLIER_NOT_FOUND: Supplier not found. Please select again
codes.ALREADY_CONFIRMED: Document is already confirmed. To modify, please cancel confirmation first
codes.ALREADY_COMPLETED: Document is already completed and cannot be modified
codes.CANNOT_DELETE: Cannot delete. There may be linked data
codes.CANNOT_CANCEL: Cannot cancel. Please check the document status
codes.EXCEED_REMAINING: Quantity cannot exceed the remaining amount
codes.ORDER_ALREADY_SHIPPED: Order has been shipped and cannot be modified
codes.PAYMENT_EXCEED_AMOUNT: Payment amount cannot exceed the payable amount
codes.RECEIPT_EXCEED_AMOUNT: Receipt amount cannot exceed the receivable amount
